    public class IndoorGardenInboundPort
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.ports.AbstractInboundPort
implements IndoorGardenCI
    The class IndoorGardenInboundPort implements an inbound port for the component interface IndoorGardenCI.

    Description

    Invariant

     invariant       getOwner() instanceof IndoorGardenImplementationI
